scripts.build: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy index.html dist\ /Y && xcopy models dist\models\ /S /E /Y && xcopy common dist\common\ /S /E /Y && xcopy tailwind.config.js dist\ /Y
scripts.deploy: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run serve
